name: Zeta Sage
description: Zeta Sage is a sativa-dominant hybrid that combines SAGE and OG Kush genetics. The flavors of Zeta Sage are a sweet, pungent mix of sharp diesel and blueberry that leave a lingering menthol aftertaste. Its uplifting rush of euphoric effects provides a heady buzz that relaxes the body without overpowering, making Zeta Sage a great choice for daytime activities.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Focused, Euphoric, Talkative, Stress, Fatigue, Nausea, Headaches, Seizures, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Anxious
